title: Fatal motorcycle crash investigated in College Park
text:
One person was killed in a motorcycle crash in the College Park area of Prince George’s County on Sunday night, one of four such incidents in the Washington area over the weekend.

The crash occurred around 8 p.m. on Baltimore Avenue north of the University of Maryland campus in College Park.

Few details were immediately available.

During the police investigation, Baltimore Avenue was closed in both directions between Indian Lane and Erie Lane, the county police said.

Police also responded to fatal crashes involving motorcycles in Virginia and in Maryland over the weekend. A total of five people died in the four crashes.

Read more:

One killed in crash on I-95 in Prince William County

Two killed in motorcycle crash in Prince William County

description: The crash shut down part of Baltimore Avenue.
